column1: Aromanian: sharpi  Catalan: serp, serpent  English: serpent  Esperanto: serpento  French: serpent  Friulian: sarpint  Galician: serpe  Interlingua: serpente  Italian: serpe, serpente
column3: Maltese: serp  Occitan: sèrp  Portuguese: serpente  Romanian: șarpe, șerpânță  Romansch: serp, siarp, serpent, serpaint  Sicilian: serpi, serpenti, sirpenti  Spanish: sierpe, serpiente  Walloon: sierpint  Welsh: sarff
